description: This file defines the 'RetailerScraper' interface, which provides an abstraction for scraping retailer product prices. It declares methods for retrieving retailer name, base URL, fetching product prices, and constructing product URLs.

classes.name: RetailerScraper
classes.description: Interface for scraping retailer product prices, including methods for retrieving retailer info and product pricing.

methods.name: retailerName
methods.description: Returns the name of the retailer.

methods.name: baseUrl
methods.description: Returns the base URL for the retailer.

methods.name: fetchPriceFor
methods.description: Fetches the price for a given product, returning an Optional BigDecimal.

methods.name: productUrl
methods.description: Constructs the URL of a product based on the Product object.
